title: SAMSUNG 198 L Direct Cool Single Door 4 Star Refrigerator  (Pebble Blue, RR21A2H2XUT/HL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Unit Refrigerator, User Manual with Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Product and 10 Years on Compressor From Samsung
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Digital Inverter Technology: This technology ensures an energy-efficient and long-lasting performance while making less noise. Also, the compressor adjusts its speed automatically to meet the cooling needs.
product_description.Stabilizer-free Operation: Even when voltage fluctuates, this fridge works steadily and reliably. When power surges, it cuts the power supply to prevent any electrical damage.

review: Very good products I like this products quality is good and cooling is good Dilevery is good and worth of money santosh kumar lakrapahari jama dumka

very good colour look is Hot very good for small family or couples very good look and performance is alos good but Little heating problem by side but good thing is no Sound excelent and very classy good looking no other extra feature just simple even old age people can use easily and best is runs without stabilizer vegetables space is small but good and plastic insede are good quality over all in some points it's worthfull but some under develop company need to focus overall iam satisfied with product and given 4 Stars for 4 star refrigerator this time delivery was too late please continue you fasten delivery as you do before we appreciate it ... Thankyou flipkart and Samsung for good product

Yes it's a value for money product from samsung looks stunning, space is okey , smooth and silent
Dilevery and installation was good they also give you some basic information and user manual over all its a good deal

Really very nice

Good for delvary...useful for small families...cooling was good....Worth of Price..finally Nice product ..go for it

Ordered Yesterday midnight and received in the morning by 9am. Amazingly fast. You will fall in love with the looks.
Waited for 5hours then pluged in.
Ice formed in about 40-50min at med setting.
Cooling is very good.
Go for it.
After 2 months of purchase,it's not cooling at all.feel cheated.pls Dunn buy here.look n test urself at near by store if u ought to purchases heavy appliances.
Very nice product colour is also good

Good look..more space for a nuclear family.. Combination of two colours i.e. purple and grey gives it classical look.. energy efficient..fastest delivery in 2 days....overall 5 upon 5 rating for this product.

Firstly, it was to be installed by company technitian. But no one turn up for weeks. Then was told it does not require installation After using this 2021 year model got the shock that It is very old design where you have to defrost and clean ( very difficult) the drain tray twice a week. The door closing require specific effort.
Nice fridge. Product delivered properly. No noise.

Everything is fine,
But water leaking in freezing cabin, its be the task now cleaning it everyday. Refrigerator comes with SOLAR input but not so useful...
Good deal, nice product, nothing much to review about
Very nice good for small family
Product quality awesome...delivery person is also good.

I liked the overall refrigerator specially the design but it's not even a month that I am using and the doors are getting stucked . It takes my whole strength to pull the door because its getting stuck again and again and it's leaving water every where from the icebox which is leaving spoilage to everything that's kept in the friz.

Issues with the model:
1. The door won’t automatically close.
2. A lot if water deposits in the defrost tray behind.
3. A lot of water deposit inside the fridge under the tray.

I’ll suggest go for LG, they are anyday winner in Refrigerators.
Very good refrigerator. Cooling capacity is so good. But after delivery no technician from samsung visited to home.

I'm using 1 month... Better feeling..
Sound less.. Cooling is super...
I am happy this fridge....
Thank you flipkart....
Everything is good but excess ice in freezer
Superb!!!!! Satisfied product and delivery...tq flipkart

Colour is quite different from what is on display site.base drawer quality is not up to the mark. Performance is good till date. More comments after a long use for days to come. Moreover value for money. Colour seems different but attractive.low sound during operation. Overall good and value for money. Ice tray is like a toy .
Excellent product. No second thought... Go for it
Very nice product in this price
Best refrigerator at this price. More space than 190l refrigerator which is good
Nice but freeze power must be more powerful
I feel like this is the best Refrigerator one can get at this price point, amazing build quality and spacious with all the latest technology.
Excellent refrigerator for a small family of 3. Consumes very less power. and Cooling is just perfect.

Good refrigerator in this range

good bild quality and performance is great but it gets to worm on the sides and if it's worth the performance will decrease.
Good product and value for money
Very good and authentic product.. can go for it ... Value budget
Broken bottom rack ! Colour varied from what I hv ordered. Let's hope Samsung will do good as I m a constant Samsung customer.
Excellent product in this price range ...
Very good product but colour not same

Very good to use.Great cooling effect.

Worst product.... I am using since last 1 year but very poor service and continuously various problem occuring in the product. I am trying to repair it but service is worst of service provider. I am fed of now
Delivery is good, product is working fine with no issues .This is the second time I m buying Samsung fridge from Samsung. No problem at all. WORTH THE VALUE.
